An amazing video game. I've had so much fun with it, and it manages to build so much upon the first game's concepts. I'd call it a perfect sequel, even. 10/10.

Podes grabar una partida de este juego y usarla en una critica hacia algo en Internet, recomendado.

This game is about robots that are using portals to travel through time and space to KILL humans! The solo campaign gives you the perspective of the humans and your objective is to stop the robots, and the coop campaign gives you the perspective of the robots where you have to use a nuke to blow up a large portion of the remaining survivors. Overall, this game is pretty gory and has a lot of swearing. 10/10

(ENG):It is a short but entertaining story. With good jokes and charismatic characters. Recommended both for people who want to get started in gaming and for people with years in the industry.
